author: beforeitsnews.com
title: MainStream Media Caught on Video Using Sandy Hook Footage for Oregon Shooting Coverage! | Alternative
text:
(Before It's News)
Yes, you read that title right. News Outlets are using the old Sandy Hook footage from December 2012 in the Oregon shooting coverage! Why would they do this?
Check out this video:
Why would they put their “reputations” on the line like this. In one of the frames in the video, you could clearly see the Sandy Hook sign.
Thanks for taking your time to check out this information. Love to hear what YOU think in the comments section below!
